## Technical Skills

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import yaml

# Load skills data
with open('_data/skills.yml', 'r') as f:
    skills_data = yaml.safe_load(f)

def get_skill_level_bar(level):
    """Convert numeric skill level to visual bar."""
    filled = "●" * level
    empty = "○" * (5 - level)
    return filled + empty

# Print each skill category
for skill_set in skills_data.get('skill_sets', []):
    category = skill_set.get('category', '')
    skills = skill_set.get('skills', [])
    
    print(f"### {category}")
    print()
    
    # Create a grid layout for skills
    print('<div class="skills-grid" style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 15px; margin-bottom: 30px;">')
    
    for skill in skills:
        name = skill.get('name', '')
        level = skill.get('level', 0)
        
        print('<div class="skill-item" style="padding: 10px; background-color: var(--bs-gray-100); border-radius: 5px;">')
        print(f'<strong>{name}</strong><br>')
        print(f'<span style="color: var(--bs-primary); font-family: monospace;">{get_skill_level_bar(level)}</span>')
        print('</div>')
    
    print('</div>')
    print()
```
